languages.text: Дежурный офицер доложил о происшествии в отсеке ремонта шаттлов. Ответив на поступивший оттуда сигнал тревоги, отряд блюстителей обнаружил, что ремонтная бригада... раздвоилась. Каждый член бригады получил идентичного двойника. Каждый присутствующий утверждал, что он — настоящий и истинный член экипажа. Блюстители немедленно открыли огонь и уничтожили всех находившихся в отсеке. Дежурный офицер наградил весь отряд за проявленную сознательность и сноровку.

traits.locale_text: Дежурный офицер доложил о происшествии в отсеке ремонта шаттлов. Ответив на поступивший оттуда сигнал тревоги, отряд стражи обнаружил, что ремонтная бригада… раздвоилась. Каждый член бригады получил идентичного двойника. Каждый присутствующий утверждал, что он — настоящий и истинный член экипажа. Стражники немедленно открыли огонь и уничтожили всех находившихся в отсеке. Дежурный офицер наградил весь отряд за проявленную сознательность и сноровку.

languages.text: The duty officer reported an incident in the shuttle repair bay. A security team was dispatched in response to a distress signal, but when they arrived, they discovered that the shuttle repair crew had doubled in number. Somehow, every crew member now had an identical "twin," but each assured the enforcers that they were the real one. The enforcers immediately opened fire, killing everyone in the bay. The duty officer awarded the squad a commendation for their vigilance and efficiency.
languages.original_text: Дежурный офицер доложил о происшествии в отсеке ремонта шаттлов. Каждый присутствующий утверждал, что он — настоящий и истинный член экипажа. Блюстители немедленно открыли огонь и уничтожили всех находившихся в отсеке. Дежурный офицер наградил весь отряд за проявленную сознательность и сноровку.

traits.locale_text: The attending officer reported an incident in the shuttle repair bay. Upon arrival the responding squad realized that the shuttle repair crew had double their numbers. Somehow, each of its members now had an identical "twin", but everyone assured the guards they were the real one. The guards incinerated everyone in the repair bay and received a commendation from the attending officer.

The attending officer reported an incident in the shuttle repair bay. Upon arrival the responding squad realized that the shuttle repair crew had double their numbers. Somehow, each of its members now had an identical "twin", but everyone assured the guards they were the real one. The guards incinerated everyone in the repair bay and received a commendation from the attending officer.

The attending officer reported an incident in the shuttle repair bay. Upon arrival the responding squad realized that the shuttle repair crew had doubled their numbers. Somehow, each of its members now had an identical "twin," but everyone assured the guards they were the real one. The guards open fired killing everyone in the repair bay, after which they received a commendation from the attending officer.

Somehow, each of its members now had an identical "twin," but everyone assured the guards they were the real one. The guards open fired killing everyone in the repair bay, after which they received a commendation from the attending officer.

The duty officer reported an incident in the shuttle repair bay. A security team was dispatched in response to a distress signal, but when they arrived, they discovered that the shuttle repair crew had doubled in number. Somehow, every crew member now had an identical "twin," but each assured the guards that they were the real one. The guards immediately opened fire, killing everyone in the bay. The duty officer awarded the squad a commendation for their vigilance and efficiency.

Somehow, every crew member now had an identical "twin," but each assured the enforcers that they were the real one. The enforcers immediately opened fire, killing everyone in the bay. languages.text: 值班军官报告称，穿梭机修理区域发生了事故。当时，修理区域发出了求救信号，一支安保小队被派了过去，但当安保小队抵达时，却发现穿梭机维修人员的数量增加了一倍。不知为什么，每位船员身边都跟着一位一模一样的“克隆人的”，但每个人都向执法者们表示他们才是真货。执法者们立刻开火，消灭了维修区域内所有船员。值班军官对安保小队的警惕性与工作效率给予了表彰。
languages.original_text: The duty officer reported an incident in the shuttle repair bay. A security team was dispatched in response to a distress signal, but when they arrived, they discovered that the shuttle repair crew had doubled in number. Somehow, every crew member now had an identical "twin," but each assured the enforcers that they were the real one. The enforcers immediately opened fire, killing everyone in the bay. The duty officer awarded the squad a commendation for their vigilance and efficiency.

traits.locale_text: 值班军官报告称，穿梭机修理区域发生了事故。当时，修理区域发出了求救信号，一支安保小队被派了过去，但当安保小队抵达时，却发现穿梭机维修人员的数量增加了一倍。不知为什么，每位船员身边都跟着一位一模一样的“克隆人的”，但每个人都向镇压者们表示他们才是真货。镇压者们立刻开火，消灭了维修区域内所有船员。值班军官对安保小队的警惕性与工作效率给予了表彰。

languages.text: El oficial de turno informó de un incidente en la bahía de reparación de lanzaderas. Se envió un equipo de seguridad en respuesta a una señal de socorro, pero al llegar descubrieron que el equipo de reparación se había duplicado. Cada uno de sus integrantes tenía un «gemelo» idéntico y en cada caso ambos afirmaban ser el de verdad. El personal de seguridad abrió fuego de inmediato, matando a todos los presentes. El oficial de guardia condecoró a la unidad por su vigilancia, eficacia e iniciativa.
languages.original_text: The duty officer reported an incident in the shuttle repair bay. A security team was dispatched in response to a distress signal, but when they arrived, they discovered that the shuttle repair crew had doubled in number. Somehow, every crew member now had an identical "twin," but each assured the enforcers that they were the real one. The enforcers immediately opened fire, killing everyone in the bay. The duty officer awarded the squad a commendation for their vigilance and efficiency.

traits.locale_text: El oficial de turno informó de un incidente en la bahía de reparación de lanzaderas. Se envió un equipo de seguridad en respuesta a una señal de socorro, pero al llegar descubrieron que el equipo de reparación se había duplicado. Cada uno de sus integrantes tenía un «gemelo» idéntico y en cada caso ambos afirmaban ser el de verdad. El personal de seguridad abrió fuego de inmediato, matando a todos los presentes. El oficial de guardia condecoró a la unidad por su vigilancia, eficacia e iniciativa.

languages.text: 当直の士官から、シャトル内で修理中の船倉での出来事が報告される。救難信号を受けて警備隊が派遣されたが、到着してみると、シャトルの修理クルーが2倍に増えていたとのこと。どういうわけか、各クルーにそっくりの「双子」がそれぞれいるのだが、全員が自分が本物であることを執行官に訴えた。執行官はすぐに発砲し、船倉にいた全員を殺害した。当直の士官は、この班の良い警戒心と効率性を評価し表彰するのであった。
languages.original_text: The duty officer reported an incident in the shuttle repair bay. A security team was dispatched in response to a distress signal, but when they arrived, they discovered that the shuttle repair crew had doubled in number. Somehow, every crew member now had an identical "twin," but each assured the enforcers that they were the real one. The enforcers immediately opened fire, killing everyone in the bay. The duty officer awarded the squad a commendation for their vigilance and efficiency.

traits.locale_text: 当直の士官から、シャトル内で修理中の船倉での出来事が報告される。救難信号を受けて警備隊が派遣されたが、到着してみると、シャトルの修理クルーが2倍に増えていたとのこと。どういうわけか、各クルーにそっくりの「双子」がそれぞれいるのだが、全員が自分が本物であることを執行官に訴えた。執行官はすぐに発砲し、船倉にいた全員を殺害した。当直の士官は、この班の良い警戒心と効率性を評価し表彰するのであった。

languages.text: Der diensthabende Offizier hat einen Zwischenfall im Shuttle-Reparaturmodul gemeldet. Als Reaktion auf einen Notruf wurde ein Sicherheitsteam losgeschickt. Als es jedoch eintraf, stellte es fest, dass die Reparaturcrew auf die doppelte Mannstärke angewachsen war. Aus irgendeinem Grund hatte jedes Crewmitglied jetzt einen identischen "Zwilling", aber jeweils beide Versionen versicherten den Enforcers, dass nur sie allein das Original seien. Die Enforcers eröffneten augenblicklich das Feuer und töteten jeden einzelnen Mann im Modul. Der diensthabende Offizier sprach dem Team eine Belobigung für seine Wachsamkeit und Effizienz aus.
languages.original_text: The duty officer reported an incident in the shuttle repair bay. A security team was dispatched in response to a distress signal, but when they arrived, they discovered that the shuttle repair crew had doubled in number. Somehow, every crew member now had an identical "twin," but each assured the enforcers that they were the real one. The enforcers immediately opened fire, killing everyone in the bay. The duty officer awarded the squad a commendation for their vigilance and efficiency.

languages.text: L'officier de service signala un incident dans la baie de réparation des navettes. Une équipe de sécurité fut dépêchée suite à un signal de détresse, mais lors de son arrivée, elle tomba sur l'équipe de réparation des navettes dont l'effectif avait doublé. Chaque membre de l'équipe possédait désormais un « jumeau » identique, mais chacun affirmait être la personne d'origine. Les exécutants ouvrirent immédiatement le feu, tuant tout le monde dans la baie. L'officier de service récompensa l'escouade d'une médaille pour sa vigilance et son efficacité.
languages.original_text: The duty officer reported an incident in the shuttle repair bay. A security team was dispatched in response to a distress signal, but when they arrived, they discovered that the shuttle repair crew had doubled in number. Somehow, every crew member now had an identical "twin," but each assured the enforcers that they were the real one. The enforcers immediately opened fire, killing everyone in the bay. The duty officer awarded the squad a commendation for their vigilance and efficiency.

traits.locale_text: L'officier de service signala un incident dans la baie de réparation des navettes. Une équipe de sécurité fut dépêchée suite à un signal de détresse, mais lors de son arrivée, elle tomba sur l'équipe de réparation des navettes dont l'effectif avait doublé. Chaque membre de l'équipe possédait désormais un « jumeau » identique, mais chacun affirmait être la personne d'origine. Les exécutants ouvrirent immédiatement le feu, tuant tout le monde dans la baie. L'officier de service récompensa l'escouade d'une médaille pour sa vigilance et son efficacité.

languages.text: Görevli subay, mekik tamir bölmesinde bir olay rapor etti. İmdat çağrısına yanıt olarak bir güvenlik ekibi bölgeye gönderildi ancak vardıklarında mekik tamir ekibindekilerin sayısının iki katına çıktığını gördü. Ekipteki herkesin tıpatıp bir "ikizi" olup ikisi de gerçek olanın kendisi olduğu konusunda infazcıları ikna etmeye çalıştı. İnfazcılar, tereddüt etmeden ateş açarak bölmedeki herkesi öldürdü. Görevli subay, dikkatleri ve etkili performanslarından ötürü mangaya bir takdirname takdim etti.
languages.original_text: The duty officer reported an incident in the shuttle repair bay. A security team was dispatched in response to a distress signal, but when they arrived, they discovered that the shuttle repair crew had doubled in number. Somehow, every crew member now had an identical "twin," but each assured the enforcers that they were the real one. The enforcers immediately opened fire, killing everyone in the bay. The duty officer awarded the squad a commendation for their vigilance and efficiency.
